attributes.action: To create an Act that would mean that all cars be fitted with a spped limiter (limiting cars to maximum speed limit)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would mean safety on our motorways and the police force being able to direct resources where they should be directed - catching Burglers and Murderers!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
